title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-10.3 - Removal of remote decontamination enclosures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-10.3 - Removal of remote decontamination enclosures

State Regulations

After all regulated abatement work areas for the asbestos
project have been dismantled as per section
56-9.3
of this Part, any remaining
remote decontamination enclosures must be dismantled and removed from the work
site. All plastic sheeting shall be removed and disposed of as asbestos
waste. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-10.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
